title: Ari Melber | House Impeaches President Trump in Historic Vote: A Closer Look
description:
Then, Seth takes a closer look at President Donald Trump becoming the third president in history to be impeached.

Ari Melber talks about the articles of impeachment, Donald Trump getting his day in court and the definition of "high crimes and misdemeanors."
